导读：先行者（first mover）是指想通过在特定市场上最先设立，来获得利润或具有不能超越的市场地位的公司。关键词：first mover …

jx.jx_cn_mean: 权势人物，有影响的人物

entry.def: If you describe a person or animal as a particular kind of mover, you mean that they move at that speed or in that way.

example.ex: We found him a nice horse — a good mover who could gallop.
example.tran: 我们发现他是匹好马，跑起来风驰电掣。

entry.def: Movers are people whose job is to move furniture or equipment from one building to another.

entry.tran: 有权势的人;权势集团的一员
entry.def: The movers and shakers in a place or area of activity are the people who have most power or influence.

example.ex: It is the movers and shakers of the record industry who will decide which bands make it.
example.tran: 能决定由哪些乐队来录制节目的是那些唱片业的大佬们。

means.word_mean: 1. workman employed by a moving company;

sentences.sentence: "the movers were very careful with the grand piano"
